Hero.title: Full Stack Engineer
Hero.subtitle: Java (SpringBoot) • Python (FastAPI) • Next.js • TypeScript • AWS • Docker
Hero.hero_description: Building scalable, high-performance applications with <highlight>modern tech</highlight>.

About.title: My Journey
About.card1_li2: Driven by the motto "Learn something new every day!", with a passion for creating scalable and innovative software solutions.
About.card1_li3: Started my programming journey in 2022 with JavaScript, deepening my studies in Python in 2023.
About.card1_li4: Currently focused on studying and developing innovative, scalable projects with Java (Spring Boot), React, NextJS, Docker, Terraform, and AWS.
About.card2_li1: My mindset was forged in soccer, treating the sport (and programming) with dedication, resilience, and teamwork.
About.card2_li2: I learned to face frustrations and never give up, a skill I apply daily when debugging code.
About.card2_li3: Furthermore, my resilience and adaptability were tested during an exchange program in Utah, USA, overcoming adaptation challenges and winning a regional soccer championship.
About.card2_li4: I consolidated my English fluency during this international experience.
About.card3_li1: Practical experience building robust full-stack applications like ZapTrack and E-commerce APIs, utilizing Java (Spring), Next.js (TS), Docker, and AWS.
About.card3_li2: At Vivo, I engineer scalable data solutions using Python (FastAPI), SQL Server, and complex ETL pipelines to solve critical business problems.
About.card3_li3: Gain experience building secure, scalable, and helpful software that solves real-world problems, laying the foundation to grow my own company, Nex Solutions.
About.card3_li4: Deliver innovation, dedication, and care in all solutions created.

Experience.title: Work Experience
Experience.li1: Developed Python automation pipelines (Pandas) that eliminated manual effort in backlog analysis and SLA metrics processing.
Experience.li2: Built high-performance Full Stack solutions (Flask + Rust parsers) to process complex operational reports (~10k rows) with geographic mapping.
Experience.li3: Engineered a modular ETL pipeline (500k+ monthly records) with ODBC processing and atomic SQL Server swaps, ensuring 100% data reliability.
Experience.li4: Modernized the data ecosystem using Clean Architecture, unifying Excel and SQL Server sources into a robust FastAPI backend.
Experience.li5: Developed a Strategic Dashboard (Next.js, Tailwind) adopted by directors and managers for monitoring KPIs on a national scale.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.p1_desc: Complete RESTful API with microservices, Spring Security, and AWS deploy with Docker.
Projects.p2_desc: Fullstack application with Spring Boot back-end and React front-end for financial management. Backend is turned off due to AWS costs.
Projects.p3_desc: Fullstack app (Node.js/React) for scheduling, with full CRUD, JWT authentication, and PostgreSQL DB.
Projects.p4_desc: Web development Startup, focused on providing modern, scalable, and innovative solutions for companies with available prices and a great user experience.
Projects.p5_desc: Fullstack app (Next.js/React) for managing links that don't convert on WhatsApp. It provides a dashboard to track and analyze the performance of the links. Focused on security, scalability, performance, and uses JWT Auth, Stripe, and PostgreSQL.
Projects.p6_desc: Landing page for a big printing company, focused on providing a new modern, tech-savvy, and user-friendly experience and visual for the company.

Contact.title: Contact
